Entries.Introduction: Oh, hey. I haven't seen you around here before. #$b#I'm Nami, haven't really been here long myself. #$b#Well, I gotta get going, see you around I guess.
Entries.danceRejection: Sorry, but no thanks. #$b#Maybe try asking someone else.
Entries.breakUp: Ah, I see. Well, maybe it's time for me to take off after all....$s
Entries.Mon: Oh, hey. Sorry, don't really have time to talk right now, got a lot on my mind.
Entries.Tue: Huh? How long have you been standing there?
Entries.Wed: You're all sweaty....did you run all the way here or something?
Entries.Thu: You know, @, you're a really fun person. #$b#Oh... Never mind.
Entries.Sun: I would've thought the chapel would be packed on Sundays. #$b#Seems like people are just milling about as usual.
Entries.spring_12: Its interesting....to have an entire event about eggs.
Entries.spring_23: I'm not the biggest fan of flowers....or dancing for that matter. #$b#That being said....I could give it a shot.
Entries.summer_10: I wish I had some of Ruby's special curry spice. #$b#That would definitely liven up the Luau.$h
Entries.summer_27: I've heard a lot of good things about the Midnight Jellies. #$b#So many people gathered in one place, and yet everyone just quietly reflects.
Entries.fall_15: Have you gone to the Stardew Fair before? I have my doubts about it, but I may as well experience what Pelican Town has to offer.
Entries.fall_26: Not much scares me. I don't assume the Spirit's Eve festival will be any different.
Entries.winter_7: I've been ice fishing once or twice before. #$b#I can't say that it's my favorite way to go about fishing....
Entries.winter_24: I don't know many people in the valley super well.....I don't think participating in the gift exchange would be a great idea...$s
Entries.Mon2: Don't you ever get tired moving around all the time? #$b#I travel a ton, and even I get exhausted sometimes.
Entries.Tue2: Huh? How long have you been standing there?
Entries.Wed2: Ugh, I'm hungry. I wonder if Doug will make me something.
Entries.Thu2: I feel sluggish today, I must not have slept well...
Entries.Fri2: Huh? Do you need something? If not, can we discuss it later?
Entries.Sat2: Mineral Town is a quiet enough place. #$b#I suppose it's time that I make room for relaxation.
Entries.Mon4: People ask me all the time why I'm traveling... But, I don't have a specific reason to tell them.
Entries.Tue4: The people in this valley are very kind. #$b#Most places have let me stay for basically free.
Entries.Wed4: Meetings and farewells are two sides of the same coin. Don't you think?
Entries.Thu4: I'm not in a great mood in the morning, so beware.
Entries.Fri4: You must have a lot of free time to come and talk to me.
Entries.Sat4: I heard there's a saloon in Pelican Town. Is it a fun place?
Entries.Sun4: Have you met Cliff? #$b#He seems really interesting, I wonder what his story is.
Entries.Mon6: Tell me about Pelican Town. I've been thinking about stopping by one of these days. #$b#Anything exciting going on?
Entries.Tue6: I like just staying here and day dreaming. #$b#Why don't you try it, @? It feels good to clear your head.$h
Entries.Wed6: I don't normally like being bothered....But since it's you, I'll allow it.
Entries.Thu6: Y'know, I've been thinking of taking up painting. I used to be pretty good at it.#$b#When I was twelve....$h
Entries.Sat6: I heard you were helping out at the museum. #$b#When I find things like that, I feel like I'm a little girl again.
Entries.Sun6: You know what, @? #$b#I don't care what everyone says about you, you're okay.$h
Entries.Mon8: Please take me to your farm. I'd like to see you working.$h
Entries.Wed8: I used to collapse from heat a lot when I was younger.#$b#I liked watching the passing people so much, I didn't notice the sun.
Entries.Thu8: I've been meaning to ask, will you teach me about farming someday?$h
Entries.Fri8: Y'know, you always seem to take the time to stop by and talk with me. #$b#I can't say that I don't appreciate it. #$b#So....thank you.$h
Entries.Sat8: Oh, @. What are you up to today?
Entries.Sun8: Want to go to another country with me? #$b#Oh, I guess you can't because of the farm. Sorry you feel that way.
Entries.Mon10: ... I was just thinking. I've been to many places, but where I feel most at ease... is here.$l
Entries.Tue10: I never thought I would find someone who understands me like you do, @
Entries.Wed10: ...If someone saw us here, do you think they'd think we're going steady?$l
Entries.Thu10: It makes me happy just talking to you. Hehehe.$h
Entries.Fri10: We should go to Forget-Me-Not Valley sometime, I would like for you to meet Ruby.
Entries.Resort: I don't know how you managed to open a resort by yourself. #$b#Don't worry, I won't ask any questions.
Entries.Custom_HM_Inn: Doug and Ann are really kind people. They let me stay here for basically free. #$b#I hope I can repay them one day...
Entries.Custom_HM_MineralBeach: The beach here is so peaceful. #$b#I could do without the rock crabs though...$s
Entries.Custom_HM_GoddessHill: How long has that mine been out of comission? #$b#It's a real shame...
Entries.Custom_HM_JeffMarket: There's quite a few things here that I haven't seen anywhere else.
Entries.Custom_HM_Library: There's a lot of interesting books here....Basil talks a bit too much though. #$b#Oh....forget I said that.$s
Entries.Custom_HM_SnackShack: Kai is an interesting guy. A little too high energy, but he's traveled around a lot too.
Entries.Custom_HM_MountainLake: It's so peaceful out here....but with a really unusual vibe.
